title: Force exerted on roller coaster at the top of loop

content.prompt: A 100 kg cart goes around the inside of a vertical loop of a roller coaster. The radius of the loop is 3 m and the cart moves at a speed of 6 m/s at the top. The force exerted by the track on the cart at the top of the loop is
